summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 17th Avenue Southwest, from Iowa Avenue to a point about 300 feet south of the south margin of West Andover Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12296 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
